scripts.deploy-mainnet: cp subgraph_mainnet.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ taobun/bandprotocol-mainnet
scripts.deploy-ropsten: cp subgraph_ropsten.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ taobun/bandprotocol-ropsten
scripts.deploy-kovan: cp subgraph_kovan.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ taobun/bandprotocol-kovan
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: cp subgraph_rinkeby.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ taobun/bandprotocol-rinkeby
